document.full_text: for democrats and moderates, the texas senate has become the firewall that can stop the tight-fisted house budget, full of large cuts, from becoming law.
document.title: the texas tribune: it's senate vs. austerity in fight over a budget
lines_and_colors: for democrats and moderates, the texas senate has become the firewall that can stop the tight-fisted house budget, full of large cuts, from becoming law.
